meanings.sent1: The uncurious cat simply ignored the new toy.
meanings.sent2: She was uncurious about the history lesson and doodled in her notebook instead.
meanings.sent3: The uncurious squirrel didn't bother to investigate the mysterious noise in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His uncurious nature was like a closed door, shutting out new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The uncurious child never asked questions and missed out on discovering new things.

meanings.definition: Lacking interest or desire to learn.
meanings.sent1: The uncurious student yawned through the entire lecture.
meanings.sent2: He remained uncurious about the world around him, content in his own bubble.
meanings.sent3: The uncurious puppy showed no enthusiasm for learning new tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her uncurious attitude towards books was like a locked door to knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The uncurious explorer never ventured beyond his familiar surroundings.
